import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" const EditPage=()=>{ const location= useLocation() let itemNo= location.state.itemNo console.log(itemNo) const item:{itemNo:number, unit:string, description:string, rate:number, qty:number,amount:number}= { itemNo:1.1, description:"Clearing of Ordinary Soil, Root and a made up Ground of the site to an average depth of 20 cm from natural ground level", unit:"m2", rate:840.00, qty:18.00, amount: 15120.00 } const handleEdit=()=>{} return(

Rate Qty Amount
) } export default EditPage
